title: sundararAjam AshrayE
sahitya:
saundara rAja mAshrayE gaja brndAvana sAranga varada rAjam


anupallavi

 nanda nandana rAjam nAga paTTaNa rAjam sundari ramArAjam 
sura vinuta mahirAjam mandasmita mukhAmbujam mandaradhara 
karAmbujam nandakara nayanAmbujam sundaratara padAmbujam


caraNam   shambaravairi janakam sannuta shuka shaunakam ambarISAdi viditam 
anAdi guruguha muditam ambujAsanAdi nutam amarEshAdi sannutam 
ambudhi garva nigraham a-nrta jaDa duhkkhApaham kambu viDambana kaNTham 
khaNDI krta dashakaNTham tumburu nuta shrIkaNTham duritApaha vaikuNTham
